# Sfx To
<!--
@name: Sfx To
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Assign Sfx to sound voice channel
## Parameters

- **voice**: The number of the voice to assign to
- **index**: The index of the Sfx to assign (must be previoulsy created with the Sfx Create instruction)
---
